name: My Little Pony Equestria Girls: Legend of Everfree
name_cn: 小马宝莉之无尽森林传说
summary: When Canterlot Highschool goes on a trip to Camp Everfree, they are surprised to find a magical force is causing strange things to happen around camp. With the help of the Mane 6 and especially Sunset Shimmer, Twilight Sparkle must confront the dark Midnight Sparkle within herself and embrace her newfound magical abilities to save the camp.
